item.title: Soils, a fragile ecosystem disturbed by human practices
item.description: Soils sustain countless processes on Earth that are essential for a thriving biosphere. A Soil can be described as a medium composed of biodiversity, minerals and nutrients which are needed for healthy and flourishing forests and vegetation.
